attributes.action: Let the voters decide their future
attributes.background: Politicians are at impasse, we stumble from one month to another to another with no resolution. It is time to give back the decision to the uk voters.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like a referendum on the UK's membership of the EU, you can sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138

If you'd like a general election, you can sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
